title: Tottenham vs Watford LIVE: Stream, latest score and goal updates
text:
Watford head coach Quique Sanchez Flores has been critically honest about his side before today's game, he said:

"We are so far from where we want.

"I want to be very clear with that because it's true and the players know and the players accept that if you want to be competitive, we are not exactly at the point we want.

"We are probably at 30 or 35%... we need to improve in many, many things if we want to be more competitive. We are working all together, we are working really hard during the week."
description: Tottenham could not wish for a more struggling opponent than Watford, as they aim to bounce back from that shock 3-0 defeat by Brighton.  Spurs are in need of a boost after the double blow of losing at the Amex and losing goalkeeper and captain Hugo Lloris for several months with a dislocated elbow.  But this might not be straightforward, with Watford be desperate to finally
